title: Pixel 3 active edge, double tap wake, lift to wake not working
content:
Hey all, I have a brand new Pixel 3 and out of the box I have updated it to Android 10, November update.

For some reason, I am unable to get these features to work,

- Active Edge, for Assistant and Silent phone...Made sure battery save is off, turned it off and on, changed to lowest sensitivity, but still not working.

- Double tap to wake only works when there is a new notification, but when the screen is off, it doesn't wake.

- Lift to wake is totally not working at all. Sensors seems fine when I was looking at Gyro and Gravity sensors using the Sensor Multitool app.

Any ideas if this is a software problem or I would need to rma the phone?

Thanks,
Warm regards,
John
